title: These ‘Severance’ wallpapers for iPhone will make you feel like a Lumon employee
content:
Severance season one may be over, but you don’t need to forget about it already. While we eagerly wait for the second season to discover what happened to the beloved characters Dylan, Helly, Irving, and Mark, there are some nice new wallpapers that you can use on your iPhone.

more…

The post These ‘Severance’ wallpapers for iPhone will make you feel like a Lumon employee appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: While season one may be over, you still can enjoy a bit more of the Apple TV+ show Severance with these Lumon inspired wallpapers.
